column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " Professor Zei ! "
#Text=Wan Shi Tong says : " I see that you have some knowledge of the past , so you should know that humans are no longer allowed in my library .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Those are the old rules .
#Text=Besides , what has a little girl got to teach Wan Shi Tong , he who knows ten thousand things ?
#Text=" Jinora says : " Well , since you 've been down in the Spirit World , the humans have invented radio .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Yes , I am well aware of the radio .
#Text=" Jinora says : " But do you know how it works ?
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " Of course I do !
#Text=There is a box , and inside the box , there is a tiny man who sings and plays musical instruments .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Actually , when we speak , our voices produce sound waves .
#Text=Radio takes those sound waves and converts them into electromagnetic energy that is transmitted through the spectrum - " Wan Shi Tong says : " All right , enough .
#Text=I did not know this .
#Text=Apparently , I have been fed some misinformation about the existence of tiny men in boxes .
#Text=Still , I am not interested in that human garbage .
#Text=Now , go away .
#Text=" Jinora says : " My grandfather was the Avatar , and I came to the Spirit World with the new Avatar to find the spirit portals .
#Text=I would think that you 'd wan na help me .
#Text=" Wan Shi Tong says : " You came with the Avatar , hm ?
#Text=Well , why did n't you say so !
#Text=Fine , you may look around .
#Text=But do n't break anything - I 'll know .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Come on , Furry - Foot , we got ta hurry !
#Text="
